name: Hook Punch
description:
This page provides details on the martial arts “hook punch”. This martial arts technique is a more controlled and effective punch than a traditional haymaker punch because a hook punch is harder to block. For information on other punching techniques (i.e. straight punch, jab, back fist, etc.), please visit Black Belt Wiki’s main Punches & Strikes section.

Martial arts punches & strikes and all other martial arts techniques should only be practiced under the supervision of a trained martial arts instructor.

Instructional Videos for a Hook Punch
